main: ^Who else would I be talking to?
^Well, I'm a dockworker, not a shopkeeper. Not many people just come up to talk to me.
section1: ^Well, like I said before, I'm a dockworker working at the docks.
^Boats from the other islands come here to... well, dock, I suppose.
section2: ^Himawari Island is part of an archipelago. People travel from town to town for various reasons...
^I was on a boat headed towards the mainland.
^Are there any boats that could take me there?
^Most of the boats that dock here are small vessels.
